msg: Why do we have two release notes files (doc/readme and RELEASE-NOTES)

author: marcsaeg
msg: Removed trim() from patch() method to avoide security hole.  This patch was applied to Tomcat 3.3 a couple months ago, but never got ported to the tomcat_32 branch.  Submitted by Kazuhiro Kazama.

author: melaquias
msg: Added several configuration attributes to the ApacheConfig tag.

author: melaquias
msg: Changed name of configuration property "org.apache.tomcat.shared.classpath" to "org.apache.tomcat.apps.classpath" to be consistent with the new TOMCAT_HOME/lib/ directory structure.

author: larryi
msg: Port fix in Tomcat 3.2.2 for Bugzilla Bug #134.
Update Resource.doFindResource() to close the ZipFile object when
no longer needed (as recommented in the JDK documentation).
